ai_description: A roll of pink and white wavy-patterned cleaning cloths with a distinctive textured, non-woven fabric appearance. The product comes as a convenient roll format wrapped in clear plastic packaging with a white label displaying the OKS brand and product details. Each cloth measures 35cm x 25cm, featuring a soft pink and white color scheme with an attractive wave-like texture. The roll contains 30 individual cloths wound around a brown cardboard core, making it easy to tear off sheets as needed. Lifestyle images show the cloths being used in kitchen and bathroom settings.
